page.title: 11Botany (cont.)
page.content: Ground Ivy,Violet,Cow Parsley,Wild Basil,Herb Robert,Forget-me-not, Comfrey,Greater Plantain,Dog Rose, Crosswort,Honeysuckle and Germander Speedwell. We were surprised to discover that although we worked in 5 different habitats;a dry canal,a roadside on high ground,a roadside on low ground, a built up hedge and a wet ditch the variety of flowers remained very similar.We came to the conclusion that the habitat within our block does not vary enough to show any marked differences in the number of wild flowers.The same types of wild flower are found,in suitable conditions, throughout the area.
